summary: Provides a Certbot DNS plugin that automates ACME DNS-01 challenges for domains managed through DigitalOcean by interfacing with the DigitalOcean DNS API to create and delete TXT records.
business_intent: Facilitates seamless, automated issuance and renewal of SSL/TLS certificates for services hosted on DigitalOcean, eliminating manual DNS record updates and supporting secure, encrypted web traffic.
